text: Vot, Bog skazhet: "Iisus, syn Marii! Govoril li ty lyudyam: "Krome Boga pochitayte yeshcho menya i moyu mater' dvumya bogami."?" On skazhet: "Khvala Tebe! Kak mne govorit' takoye, chego ya ne dolzhen govorit'? Yesli by ya govoril eto, Ty znal by to: Ty znayesh', chto vo Mne; no ya ne znayu, chto v Tebe; ibo ty odin vpolne znayushchiy tayny
